sql.name: queryXhLoanerAccountInfoList
sql.sqlString: select a.LOANER_MAIN_ACCOUNT_ID,/*借款人主账户ID*/ a.DEALING_TYPE,/*交易类型 0:还款存入 1：结算划扣*/ a.DEAILING_MONEY,/*交易金额*/ a.DEALING_TIME,/*交易时间*/ a.ID from XH_LOANER_ACCOUNT_INFO a where 1=1 $sql

sql.name: queryJkhtByXhLoanerAccount
sql.sqlString: select t.qshkrq, t.hkqs as hkqsOld, to_char(months_between(to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm'),'yyyy-mm'),to_date(to_char(to_date(t.qshkrq,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm'),'yyyy-mm')))+1 as hkqs, t.ylxje+t.ybjje as money from xh_jkht t where 1 = 1 $sql
